attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Approver id: Userid of approver, a user of the app

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Includes first name and last name

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Approval Type: Ex: Financial approver, category approver

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Approval Status of overall process spanning several workitems: Active, open, Approved, Rejected, Partially approved

attributes.name: receivedDate
attributes.description: When the workitem reached the approver

attributes.name: processedDate
attributes.description: When the approver processed the workitem
